Our Amazing Team

We take a creative and systematic approach to engineer comprehensive solutions for our clients at HMN. Leading projects from creation through engineering constrctuion plans & permitting. Our vision encourages creativity, accountability, and respect. This environment allows our professionals to freely perform with excellence for our valued clients.

Zachary Finley

Co-Owner

Jacob Jaskowiak

Co-Owner

HMN Consulting, LLC was founded by a team of experienced professionals partnering for 10 years. Our team of professionals will review existing infrastructure and field conditions during construction design. A dedicated team of unique individuals utilizing their expertise to achieve company and client goals.
